scripts.push-heroku: cd .. && git subtree push --prefix express-app/ heroku master && cd express-app
scripts.push-heroku-force: cd .. && git subtree split --prefix express-app/ -b heroku && git push -f heroku heroku:master && git branch -D heroku && cd express-app
scripts.build: cd ../react-app && npm install && npm run build && cp -r build/ ../express-app/build

hooks.pre-commit: echo build react and copy into express directory && npm run build
